resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157814</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157814</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2968</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Work sheets for English Language Learning centers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit Blätter für englische Erlernen der 
Sprachemitten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuilles de travail pour les centres d'étude 
d'anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folhas do trabalho para centros da aprendizagem 
de língua inglesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fogli del lavoro per i centri di apprendimento 
delle lingue inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλα εργασίας για τα κέντρα εκμάθησης αγγλικών 
γλωσσών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hojas del trabajo para los centros del 
aprendizaje de idiomas ingleses</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An Educational Portal for English Language Learning centers, with worksheets for students, that can be downloaded and used on a variety of topics.Also includes a few lesson plans</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">10 commandments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">celebration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">customs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für englische Erlernen der Sprachemitten, mit 
Bogen für Kursteilnehmer, die ein pädagogisches Portal auf einer 
Vielzahl von topics.Also downloadet werden und verwendet werden 
können, schließt einige Lektionpläne ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un portail éducatif pour les centres d'étude 
d'anglais, avec des tableaux pour les étudiants, qui peuvent être 
téléchargés et utilisés sur une variété de topics.Also inclut 
quelques plans de leçon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um portal educacional para centros da 
aprendizagem de língua inglesa, com as folhas para os estudantes, que
podem downloaded e usado em uma variedade de topics.Also inclui 
algumas plantas da lição</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un portal educativo per i centri di apprendimento
delle lingue inglesi, con i fogli di lavoro per gli allievi, che 
possono essere trasferiti ed usati su una varietà di topics.Also 
include alcuni programmi di lezione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εκπαιδευτική πύλη για τα κέντρα εκμάθησης 
αγγλικών γλωσσών, με τα φύλλα εργασίας για τους σπουδαστές, οι 
οποίοι μπορούν να μεταφορτωθούν και να χρησιμοποιηθούν σε ποικίλα
θέματα Επίσης περιλαμβάνει μερικά σχέδια μαθήματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un portal educativo para los centros del 
aprendizaje de idiomas ingleses, con las hojas de trabajo para los 
estudiantes, quienes pueden ser descargados y ser utilizados en una 
variedad de topics.Also incluye algunos planes de la lección</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">10 Gebote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewohnheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">10 commandements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">célébration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coutumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">10 commandments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">celebration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">costumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bibbia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">10 ordini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">celebrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitudini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βίβλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">10 εντολές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">religión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">costumbres</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
